widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: LawNext Directory:
config.description: We helped Bob and Ben Ambrogi launch LawNext Legal Directory, a comprehensive source of information for legal tech products and services consumers.

config.title: Blasts:
config.description: In addition to our regular campaigns, we sent "Your Year in Review" to all lawyers with a claimed profile in Justia Lawyer Directory. We've also started our Quarterly Justia Connect Newsletter.

config.title: State Codes:
config.description: We continued advancing with the 2021 versions of our State Codes, with the addition of New York, Florida, Montana, among other states.

config.title: QA Automation:
config.description: Our QA Automation Team released new automated QA jobs for the Justia Connect main application.

config.title: Database Upgrades:
config.description: We are still in the process of upgrading all our properties' databases. The ones most recently completed are those used by Justia Friends properties like Jurispro.com, Oregon Legal Research, and ediscoverycouncil.com.

config.title: Ask a Lawyer Statistics Dashboard:
config.description: Our data team added a dashboard to see Ask a Lawyer statistics directly in our server. We will be adding more and more dashboards as time allows!
